participant_1.background:
I was so proud of myself when I won the spelling bee.
I think about the beauty of nature and how lucky I am to experience it with my dog.
i m not really a blond.
my favorite show is tom and jerry.
I enjoy wearing suits that make a statement.

participant_2.background:
I am a hippopotamus, and I spend my days swimming in the river, eating plants, and basking in the sun.
i like the band queens of the stone age.
i listen to linking park , i do not know why.
my favorite singer is justin timberlike.
My most valuable possession is my intellect, which I plan to use to take over the world.

content.text: Hi! I am a big fan of Tom and Jerry!
Hi! I am a hippopotamus, and I spend my days swimming in the river, eating plants, and basking in the sun. What is your favorite episode of Tom and Jerry?
I like the one where Tom and Jerry are playing baseball. It is so funny!
That is a good one! I also like the one where Tom is trying to catch Jerry in the bathtub.
Yes, that one is funny too! I love Tom and Jerry. They are the best!
Me too! They are my favorite cartoons.
Do you like any other cartoons?
I like a lot of cartoons, but my favorites are Tom and Jerry, Looney Tunes, and Scooby-Doo.
I like all of those cartoons too! We have a lot in common.
Yes, it seems like we do! I am glad to meet you.
Me too! It is nice to meet you too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go swimming, hiking, and camping. I also like to play video games and watch movies.
I like to do a lot of the same things! I also like to read and play music.
I like to read too! I do not play music, but I enjoy listening to it.
We have so much in common! I am glad to have met you.
Me too! I am glad to have met you too.
